title: 1878 Forbes co. Baseball trade cards H804-6 full set
author: edtiques

posts.post_title: 1878 Forbes co. Baseball trade cards H804-6 full set
posts.post_content: Hello....I have all 6 of the trade cards in the set that I'm selling for $200 including shipping.Please note there's a 1/4" -1/2" in. tear in the "Muff" card halfway up on the right side.Send me an PM if you're interested. Thanks ... Ed (edtiques)
I'll take them at listed price.
nice buy!  tough to find a matching set like that with same advertisement.

[quote name="ullmandds" post=1240318]nice buy!  tough to find a matching set like that with same advertisement.[/QUOTE]

Thanks! It is my second set, but only  matching set.
